title: Educating national security leaders on artificial intelligence
summary: MIT has developed a three-day custom program called "Artificial Intelligence for National Security Leaders" (AI4NSL) to educate military and government leaders on the basics of AI, machine learning, and data science as they relate to national security. The program aims to help leaders understand the benefits and potential negative consequences of AI, as well as how to navigate organizational challenges in adopting these technologies. The course covers technical topics in AI and also emphasizes organizational planning and implementation. The program brings together leaders from various branches of the military and is updated regularly to address the rapidly changing landscape of AI in national security.
